1370: Woutersoet was born in Cromme straet in 1370.
Got married to Thedwi at age 18 in 1370.
1374: Had a daughter with Thedwi, Thedwi, at age 22.
1375: Had a daughter with Thedwi, Gertrudis, at age 23.
1376: Had a daughter with Thedwi, Meynseth, at age 24.
1377: Had a son with Thedwi, Herman, at age 25.
1379: Lost son Herman when Herman was 3 years old.
1382: Had a son with Thedwi, Brame, at age 30.
Lost son Brame when Brame was 1 years old.
1384: Lost daughter Meynseth when Meynseth was 9 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1385: Had a daughter with Thedwi, Liudburgis, at age 33.
1388: Lost daughter Gertrudis when Gertrudis was 14 years old.
1394: Had a son with Thedwi, Sollen, at age 42.
